::EndBringer/Scyther/Demise::

EndBringer swears and ducks under a shot, rolling to the side to 
avoid more. One shot glazes his shoulder, doing minimal damage.

Two missile launchers flip out of his shoulders, sending two missiles 
at Tankor. He jumps on an elevated rock, hoping Tankorr would blast 
it down. If only EndBringer could get in close...
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Cloaked, Scyther calmly watches the battle. He was invisible, 
undetectable, and therefore, safe. He unsheathes his scythe, ready to 
kill someone.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Demise blocks a missile from Rampage with his claws, easily taking 
the explosion. The beast charges the smaller bot, ignoring more 
explosions.

Like EndBringer, Demise was deadly at close range.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Tankkor plows over the snow drift and comes down hard, and 
the bots on 
> top of him go into the battle plan, taking a target and proceeding 
after it. 
> Tankkor, as he was promised, got the first shots. He targets 
Endbringer, and 
> releases a few shots from his powerful tank turrets while the other 
> Predacons, Rampage included, unlease thier well stocked ammo.
